sentences.en: Double rhythms, resounding through the lyric depiction and connecting with each other , indicate the thespian place of mankind and the cognition of the writer to this thespian place.
sentences.cn: 这双重旋律互为表里, 表明了人类的某种悲剧性处境以及作家对这种悲剧性处境的感受和认识.

sentences.en: Every lyric and every word of it is worth cherishing.
sentences.cn: 期间的每一句台词和每一首歌曲都值得久久回味.

sentences.en: He wrote some great music, but the lyrics weren’t that good.
sentences.cn: 他创作过一些不错的曲子，但歌词不是很好。

sentences.en: His earlier work announced a lyric talent of the first order.
sentences.cn: 他的早期作品显露了一流的抒情才华.

sentences.en: It is more a lyric than a folk story.
sentences.cn: 与其说这是个民间故事,不如说是首抒情诗.

sentences.en: Ovid and Horace challenge comparison with the best elegiac and lyric poets of Greece.
sentences.cn: 奥维德和贺雷西要同希腊最好的挽歌和抒情诗人争一日之长.

sentences.en: Self - image is the basic performance of lyric poetry means.
sentences.cn: 自我 形象的塑造是抒情诗词的基本表现手段.

sentences.en: Singing lyric due to light - wan, to break lengthened sound, melodious Qingli.
sentences.cn: 唱腔以轻婉抒情见长, 多曼声折转, 清丽悠扬.

sentences.en: The anthology reveals a prejudice in favour of lyric poets.
sentences.cn: 这部选集显示出对抒情诗人有所偏爱.

sentences.en: The Lyric Theatre is presenting a new production of "Over the Bridge".
sentences.cn: 利里克剧院正在上演新排的《桥对面》。

sentences.en: This is a good example of his lyric poetry.
sentences.cn: 这首诗是他抒情诗的范例.

sentences.en: This is a good example of Shelley's lyric poetry.
sentences.cn: 这首诗是雪莱抒情诗的范例.

sentences.en: Why should there be this uncomfortable moment on a seemingly positive lyric?
sentences.cn: 为什么这种令人不安的时刻会和看似正面的歌词同时出现?

sentences.en: Wordsworth was one of the greatest lyric poets of his time.
sentences.cn: 华兹华斯是他那个时代最伟大的抒情诗人之一。

words.tran_cn: 抒情诗调的；感情丰富的；充满愉悦的
抒情性；抒情诗体；抒情方式抒情
抒情诗人；（流行歌曲等的）歌词作者
弹七弦琴的人；抒情诗人

trans.tran_cn: 抒情的，抒情诗的，感情丰富的，歌喉柔美的，音乐剧的
trans.tran_en: expressing strong personal emotions such as love, in a way that is similar to music in its sounds and  rhythm
